title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: A story of humanity’s desperate fight against man-eating Titans.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy sails the seas in search of the legendary treasure One Piece.

title: Demon Slayer
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his sister.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Ishida Sui
description: Kaneki struggles with his identity after being turned into a half-ghoul.

title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: A young ninja dreams of becoming the strongest leader of his village.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains Soul Reaper powers to protect the living and the dead.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers use alchemy in search of the Philosopher’s Stone.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba, Takeshi Obata
description: A high schooler gains a notebook that lets him kill anyone by writing their name.

title: Black Clover
author: Yūki Tabata
description: Asta, born without magic, strives to become the Wizard King.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Gege Akutami
description: Yuji Itadori joins a sorcerer school to fight curses after swallowing a deadly relic.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Gon Freecss searches for his father and faces deadly, strange challenges.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: Denji fuses with a devil to become a violent weapon against other devils.

title: Blue Lock
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro, Yusuke Nomura
description: A brutal program forces strikers to compete to become Japan's best forward.

title: Dr. Stone
author: Riichiro Inagaki, Boichi
description: After a global petrification, a genius rebuilds science to revive humanity.

title: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: Guild members take on quests, relying on magic and strong bonds.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
author: Nobuhiro Watsuki
description: A wandering swordsman seeks redemption during Japan's Meiji era.

title: Vagabond
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: A lyrical, fictionalized retelling of Miyamoto Musashi's path as a samurai.

title: Berserk
author: Kentaro Miura
description: A dark epic of revenge, fate, and monstrous struggle in a brutal world.

title: Gantz
author: Hiroya Oku
description: People revived by a sphere are forced into deadly alien-hunting missions.

title: Claymore
author: Norihiro Yagi
description: Half-human warriors, Claymores, battle monstrous Yoma while facing their own nature.

title: Soul Eater
author: Atsushi Ōkubo
description: Students at a weapon-meister school hunt evil souls to strengthen their weapons.

title: Black Lagoon
author: Rei Hiroe
description: A mercenary crew takes dangerous jobs in a violent criminal underworld.

title: D.Gray-man
author: Katsura Hoshino
description: Exorcists wield special weapons to fight Akuma and a spreading darkness.

title: Akame ga Kill!
author: Takahiro, Tetsuya Tashiro
description: Revolutionaries confront a corrupt empire, with brutal choices and consequences.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
author: Nakaba Suzuki
description: A group of legendary knights must reclaim their honor and save the kingdom.

title: Toriko
author: Mitsutoshi Shimabukuro
description: A gourmet hunter seeks the rarest ingredients in a food-obsessed world.

title: Great Teacher Onizuka
author: Tohru Fujisawa
description: A reformed delinquent becomes an unorthodox teacher who changes students' lives.

title: Reborn!
author: Akira Amano
description: An ordinary teen is trained by a baby hitman and dragged into mafia chaos.

title: Monster
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A doctor hunts a former patient who becomes a chilling serial killer.

title: Parasyte
author: Hitoshi Iwaaki
description: Human hosts battle sentient parasites that invade and control bodies.

title: Ajin: Demi-Human
author: Gamon Sakurai
description: The revelation of immortal Ajin upends society and sparks violent conflict.

title: Elfen Lied
author: Lynn Okamoto
description: A mutated girl with lethal powers confronts cruelty and isolation.

title: Noragami
author: Adachitoka
description: A minor god seeks followers while helping humans with supernatural problems.

title: Made in Abyss
author: Akihito Tsukushi
description: Adventurers descend into a deadly chasm chasing relics and hidden truths.

title: Pluto
author: Naoki Urasawa, Osamu Tezuka
description: A noir reimagining where robots and humans collide around a string of murders.

title: Yu Yu Hakusho
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: A delinquent becomes a spirit detective battling demons and supernatural foes.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
author: Yoshiyuki Sadamoto
description: Teen pilots enter giant mechs to fight mysterious beings while facing inner trauma.

title: Trigun
author: Yasuhiro Nightow
description: A notorious gunslinger roams a desert world, blending action and oddball humor.

title: Hellsing
author: Kouta Hirano
description: An organization deploys vampires and soldiers to combat supernatural threats.

title: Samurai Champloo
author: Masaru Gotsubo
description: Three strangers travel Edo-era Japan in a stylish mix of samurai action and music.

title: 20th Century Boys
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: Friends must stop a cult whose plans eerily mirror their childhood games.

title: Akira
author: Katsuhiro Otomo
description: Esper powers erupt into chaos in a dystopian, cyberpunk Neo-Tokyo.

title: Battle Angel Alita
author: Yukito Kishiro
description: A cyborg with lost memories fights to uncover her past in a ruined world.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: Generations of the Joestar family face bizarre supernatural threats.

title: Zetman
author: Masakazu Katsura
description: A dark story about engineered 'heroes' and the moral cost of power.

title: Beelzebub
author: Ryūhei Tamura
description: A delinquent is stuck raising an infant demon king amidst gang fights and absurdity.

title: Medaka Box
author: Nisio Isin, Akira Akatsuki
description: A prodigious student council solves school problems that escalate into strange challenges.

title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Gaiden
author: Akira Amano
description: Side stories expanding the mafia comedy-action world of Reborn!

title: Nanatsu no Taizai: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
author: Nakaba Suzuki
description: A follow-up saga with new heroes, gods, and looming prophecies.

title: The Breaker
author: Jeon Geuk-jin, Park Jin-hwan
description: A timid student trains under a mysterious master and enters the martial underground.

title: Sun-Ken Rock
author: Boichi
description: A man rises through gang ranks in Korea to protect those he cares about.

title: Kengan Ashura
author: Yabako Sandrovich
description: Corporate-sponsored gladiatorial fights decide power and business supremacy.

title: Kengan Omega
author: Yabako Sandrovich
description: The Kengan fighting world continues with new rivals and higher stakes.

title: Shaman King
author: Hiroyuki Takei
description: Shamans battle using spirit allies to win the Shaman Fight and become king.

title: Air Gear
author: Oh! great
description: Riders use powered skates to compete in high-speed, gravity-defying battles.

title: Deadman Wonderland
author: Jinsei Kataoka, Kazuma Kondou
description: In a deadly prison-amusement park, inmates fight for survival and answers.

title: Blame!
author: Tsutomu Nihei
description: A lone wanderer searches vast megastructures for a way to restore human networks.

title: Dorohedoro
author: Q Hayashida
description: A scarred man seeks his identity in a surreal world of sorcerers and violence.

title: Usogui
author: Toshio Sako
description: A genius gambler plays high-stakes games where bluffing can mean life or death.

title: All You Need Is Kill
author: Hiroshi Sakurazaka, Takeshi Obata
description: A soldier relives a deadly time loop and must find a way to break it.

title: Baki the Grappler
author: Keisuke Itagaki
description: A young fighter trains obsessively to surpass brutal, monstrous opponents.

title: Baki: New Grappler
author: Keisuke Itagaki
description: The next arc continues intense martial arts battles and Baki's relentless growth.

title: Baki: Son of Ogre
author: Keisuke Itagaki
description: Baki faces even more monstrous foes to prove himself the ultimate fighter.

title: Record of Ragnarok
author: Takumi Fukui, Shinya Umemura
description: Gods and humans clash in gladiatorial battles determining humanity's fate.

title: Vivy Prototype
author: Tappei Nagatsuki, Morito Yamataka
description: An AI singer struggles to change a dark, predetermined future while uncovering conspiracies.
